amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Development Assistance account by $250 million in order to fund clean water and other anti-poverty programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the Development Assistance account by $250 million (by offset) to provide clean water and anti-poverty assistance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 224 (Roll no. 249).
